Side Effects: After taking it during the night_ I had trouble staying awake in the morning and went back to bed until 2:00 p.m.  Still tired_ it apparently wore off and I was okay_ but will not take it again as I am supersensitive to many prescription drugs.

Comments: All antihistimines make me grumpy but these are a nightmare. Good for getting to sleep but I've spent the whole of today in a rage. I'd rather deal with the symptoms than make everyone avoid me.
